Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is regarded as a promising energy conversion device because of its advantages such as high efficiency and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: With the advent of aviation electrification era, SOFC has been gradually studied as aviation power system.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: However, the high temperature operation and temperature gradient of SOFC bring challenges to practical application.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: Nowadays SOFC systems often use excessive air as coolant to reduce the temperature gradient of SOFC, which leads to the increases of the fuel con-sumption and reduction of the power generation efficiency.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: In order to maintain a lower temperature gradient with less air, a supercritical fuel cooled SOFC scheme is proposed in this paper.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: By establishing a one-dimensional model of conventional air-cooled fuel cell and fuel cell with fuel cooling channel.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: Through calculating the fuel cell temperature gradient under different working conditions, the results show that when the excess air coefficient (EAC) is 3, the temperature gradient of air-cooled SOFC reaches 22.7K/cm, while the temperature gradient of SOFC with fuel channel decreases to 8.35K/cm.
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Sentencas: Therefore, the SOFC with fuel channel can effectively reduce the use of air, reduce parasitic power consumption and improve the efficiency of the system while maintaining a lower temperature gradient.(c) 2023
Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming

Titulo: Feasibility study on supercritical fuel cooled solid oxide fuel cell stack with internal reforming
